name: WIP of 3d rocket game
description:
CONTROLS 

SPACEBAR -- THRUST

A D   -- LEFT  RIGHT MOVEMENT

Hi,  this is a work in progress of a game I am developing. Its the first game I made since I started learning about video game programming. I plan to do more with this like add more levels, improve the art, add a level select , pause menu and death screen. As well as new physics to add to each level. 

This is a rocket navigation game where you fly around the level trying to get to the end platform. Each level will have its own challenge. Whether its a narrow gap, moving platform , closing windows of opportunities or timing a cycle just right. Other types might include a timed run, or the level shrinking to the point where it also acts like a timed run. You can save progress by completing a level and then coming back to a level select menu.
